archimate:Requirement.name: BC.2.1.6d: d) Maximum Acceptable Outage (MAO) for information, systems and services (the maximum amount of time beyond which their unavailability would be unacceptable to the organisation)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
